title: [Large-Scale] Cognitive Load Theory-Based Police Training Program Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic police work knowledge and intermediate-level job experience
context.additional_context: Contextual simulation learning environments utilizing digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners apply CLT-based instructional methods in real police work scenarios to improve information processing efficiency by 30%
Learners design strategies to reduce cognitive load by 20% when making complex situational judgments using digital learning tools
Learners transfer and apply 80% or more of training content to real work environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
